main.Query:
Declare @vchSQL varchar(8000) Declare @bigsql varchar(8000)
set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + '] IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[USP_GetAlPoolsByPoolStatus]'') AND type in (N''P'', N''PC'')) DROP PROCEDURE [dbo].[USP_GetAlPoolsByPoolStatus] ' exec (@vchSQL)
set @vchSQL ='CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[USP_GetAlPoolsByPoolStatus] @Status nvarchar(100) AS BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON
Select * From dbo.tblDimPool Where [Status] = @Status END ' SET @BigSQL = 'USE [' + @DBName + ']; EXEC sp_executesql N''' + @vchSQL + ''''; EXEC (@BigSQL)
